description: Isaac just can't get enough dick in his mouth and once again we brought him back to show James how it is done. The boys have just met and they both have been with us before but finally we have them together to experience what a real CJB is all about. James is a laid back quiet fellow but Isaac is the more dominating one who is ready to take the reins. Come relax while these two waste no time in pulling their cocks out. Enjoy!
title: Let's Do This
